Title: Relates to retroactive enrollment in child health insurance plans
Summary: Permits coverage under Child Health Plus to take effect retroactively to the first day of the month in which the application was submitted for children who meet the eligibility criteria, provided that the applicant for insurance submits a completed and signed application and required information and documentation within sixty days of the child's birth.
LawCode: Amd ยง2511, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to retroactive enrollment in the Child Health Insurance Plan
